actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to assist veterans with a permanent and total service-connected disability due to loss or loss of use of one upper and one lower extremity to acquire specially adapted housing.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to assist in acquiring specially adapted housing for those veterans who have a permanent and total service-connected disability due to the loss, or loss of use, of one upper and one lower extremity, such as to preclude locomotion without the aid of braces, crutches, canes, or a wheelchair.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to assist veterans with a permanent and total service-connected disability due to loss or loss of use of one upper and one lower extremity to acquire specially adapted housing.
